articles.author: Joann Muller
articles.title: Automakers tap COVID playbook to cope with Trump tariffs - Axios
articles.description: The trade war is hitting at the same time they're juggling technological change, regulatory pressures and Chinese competition.
articles.content:
After weeks of stalled decision-making, the global trade war automakers were hoping to avoid is now here, providing a measure of clarity that had been missing.

articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: Users report emotional bonds with startlingly realistic AI voice demo - Ars Technica
articles.description: Sesame’s new AI voice model features uncanny imperfections, and it’s willing to act like an angry boss.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Scientists genetically engineer mice with thick hair like the extinct woolly mammoth - NBC News
articles.description: Scientists at the biotech company Colossal Biosciences say they have genetically engineering mice with qualities to resemble extinct species like the woolly mammoth.
articles.content: On Tuesday, Colossal announced that its scientists have simultaneously edited seven genes in mice embryos to create mice with long, thick, woolly hair. They nicknamed the extra-furry rodents as the C… [+1310 chars]
